properties.Observatio: The height of the anicut is not sufficient. (Existing anicut- L=10.5m, H=1.2m, W=0.45m)
properties.Descriptio: Scarifying existing rock or concrete surface/Supplying and fixing M.S. dowels spliced and dovetailed with wedge at one end 16mm dia. And 600mm long, boring holes to 0.3m depth in fixing/Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing for structure

properties.Observatio: Starting from Pitawala canal. The total length of canal is 1.5 Km. Some parts of the canal have been concreted (W=0.45m, H=0.3m). There is still about 1Km to be concreted. 35 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Name of th: Canal from Pitawela to Pathane wela
properties.Observatio: Starting from mulgama kandura. The existing canal (W=0.3m, H=0.3m) is largely dilapidated. Therefore, paddy is not cultivated at present.15 acres of paddy have been cultivated from this canal.

properties.Observatio: The total length of canal is 600m. 10m of the canal (W=0.3m, H=0.3m) have been concreted but water leaks. the rest of the canal remains as an earthen canal. 7 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
